title: Taken to the Edge
description: Prequel for the first installment of The Guardian Angelinos series, Edge of Sight.After discussion with another librarian it has been decided that it is just too confusing to use a cover image from a different book by Roxanne St. Claire, even if they are related through being part of the same series. Therefore I have removed the Edge of Sight cover image from this book's details.Librarian's Note: this is a free novella offered by Roxanne St. Claire on her website.
author: Roxanne St. Claire
